explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a new approach using a sophisticated machine learning method called Node2Vec.
explanations.unsupervised learning: Node2Vec is an unsupervised learning method used to learn low-dimensional representations of the network.
explanations.representation learning: The paper focuses on learning an embedded low-dimensional representation of the funds-assets network, which is a form of representation learning.
explanations.feature representation: The embedding Fund2Vec is a learned feature representation of the network.
explanations.neural network: Node2Vec is based on neural network techniques for learning node embeddings.
explanations.deep learning: Node2Vec is a deep learning method used for network embedding.
